TITLE_SCREEN_INTRO.en-US: Welcome to the corner office! You are the newly appointed CEO of Acme Bank Ltd., a venerable institution on the cusp of starting its second half-century. Alas, things are about to get stormy…
TITLE_SCREEN_INTRO.fi-FI: Tervetuloa kulmahuoneeseen! Sinut on juuri nimitetty Acme-pankin toimitusjohtajaksi.

AUTHORS.en-US: Concept: Henri Schildt • Design: Kiira Keski-Hakuni • Engineering: Kalle Järvenpää
